EmailTemplate.name: Region 4 Special Paper Pricing. 92 Bright, Pastels, Image Print, Pallets
EmailTemplate.subject: Region 4 Special Paper Pricing: 92 Bright, Pastels, Image Print, Pallets
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your orders with us!
See attachments to see pictures of the following paper, which will be your best value with Region 4 through December 29, 2018.
Xerox - 92 Bright, 20 lb - $30.99/case
Item# 275-474
Image Print - 98 Bright, 20 lb - $32.99/case
Item# 617-206
Xerox Vitality Pastels - $38.99/case
Item # 791-905 Pink Pastel Paper
Item # 791-806 Green Pastel Paper
Item # 276-927 Blue Pastel Paper
Item # 839-148 Yellow Pastel Paper
Office Depot Pallet - 40 cases for $1189 - $29.73/case
92 Bright, 20 lb
Item# 103-057
Call if you need me to place the order on a pallet for you and I'll verify your dock and liftgate requirements!
Thank you-
{!User.Name} {!User.TitleTrimmed__c} {!User.Street} | {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode} {!if(!ISBLANK(User.My_Customer_Contact__c), 'Tel: '+User.My_Customer_Contact__c,'' )} Email: {!User.Email}
